items.title: On Techmeme's 20th birthday, its founder explains what's behind the site's consistency, debunks some supposed media trends, and outlines future directions (Gabe Rivera/Techmeme News)
items.summary:
Gabe Rivera / Techmeme News:
On Techmeme's 20th birthday, its founder explains what's behind the site's consistency, debunks some supposed media trends, and outlines future directions  —  Please clap for Techmeme  —  Techmeme turns 20 freaking years old today.  This is our self-congratulatory post marking the occasion.

items.title: All-new Beats iPhone 17/Air cases arrive with light launch deals: Kickstand lanyard, Rugged texture, more
items.summary:
After taking its first jump into the iPhone case space for iPhone 16 last year, Apple’s Beats brand has a fresh collection of covers for this year’s iPhone 17, 17 Pro, and iPhone Air models up for grabs. This year’s lineup features three different models – the basic matte finish variant with MagSafe and Camera Control, the Rugged Case with a textured finish and impact-absorbing sidewalls, and finally, the Kickstand Case with a detachable lanyard that doubles as a stand. On top of that, we are already tracking some light launch discounts on several of them at Amazon. 

more…

What we love

There’s something about the look of this band that really appeals to me. If I had to put my finger on it, I think it ranges from the rugged appearance to its stretchy design. The whole thing has a vintage vibe to it that I think helps set it apart from many others out there.

items.title: At least 107 killed in Congo as whaleboat sinks in river

Courtesy of Sharge’s official Amazon storefront, you can now score its Pixel 140 3-port laptop charger for $76.14 shipped with a 10% off coupon that auto-applies during checkout. This is a fairly new model that hit the scene a couple of months back carrying a $94 price tag. It dropped to the $85 mark exclusively for Prime members shortly after its debut, but today’s deal shaves an additional $9 off to mark a new best price to beat. The 100W variant of this charger with an additional USB-A port is also down to $58.32 shipped today, down from its usual price of $72. Head below for more details.

items.title: Encyclopedia Britannica and Merriam-Webster sue Perplexity for copying their definitions
items.summary: The AI web search company Perplexity is being hit by another lawsuit alleging copyright and trademark infringement, this time from Encyclopedia Britannica and Merriam-Webster. In the lawsuit, the companies allege that Perplexity’s “answer engine” scrapes their websites, steals […]

items.summary:
TenTrend 70W 6-in-1 USB-C Universal Travel Adapter

Buy for $15 (Reg. $30)

Apply code 5VLQWWWF during checkout

What we love

It doesn’t matter if you have an international trip just around the corner or nothing in sight quite yet, this deal is worth cashing in on now. With this travel adapter you’ll be able to use it across the “EU, UK, AUS, USA, China, and Japan.” My favorite feature here is that there are 4 USB-C ports, with the ability to charge one device at up to 70W, helping ensure it can even handle a wide variety of laptops.

items.summary:
Apple’s iPhone 17 lineup is officially open for orders, and you might want to lock in your unit before ship dates slip into October or beyond. We’ve already rounded up all of the best deals on iPhone 17 cases here if you’re shopping for new ones to protect your device from day one, but here’s another one that gets you a 3-pack of LISEN translucent MagSafe cases for $19.99 Prime shipped (a $6 delivery fee will apply otherwise). Don’t forget to clip the on-page coupon to see the discounted price during checkout. LISEN’s latest iPhone 17 case lineup launched just days ago at $30, later settling at $25. Thanks to today’s coupon, you can grab the 3-pack for just $19.99, which works out to about $6.50 each – a solid price for what appears to be reliable, protective MagSafe-ready cases for daily use.

items.summary:
Over at Wellbots, we just spotted an amazing opportunity for anyone wanting to go big with their home backup support, with EcoFlow’s DELTA Pro Ultra Power Station bundled with one expansion battery at $5,604.05 shipped, which appears after an automatic 5% discount is applied in your cart, and currently beats Amazon’s pricing by $894. While it carries a $9,397 MSRP directly from the brand (currently $6798), at Wellbots, however, it starts off at a lower $8,799 full price. The discounts we’ve seen up until today have only ever dropped costs on this package as low as $6,299, which we last saw during July’s Prime Day event. The deal here gives you more savings than ever as $3,195 is cut from the tag (not to mention it’s $3,793 off its MSRP), landing it at a new all-time low price.

items.title: Former chief justice Karki named Nepal's first female leader after unrest
items.summary: KATHMANDU (Reuters) - Sushila Karki, a former chief justice, will become the first woman to lead Nepal, to be sworn in as interim leader later on Friday after violent anti-graft protests forced Prime Minister K.P. Sharma Oli to resign, the president's office said. Read full story

items.title: New limited edition Astro Bot Joyful DualSense now available for purchase
items.summary:
Update 9/12: The new ASTRO BOT Joyful Limited Edition DualSense controller is now available for purchase at Walmart and Target, among others.

  • Walmart ASTRO BOT Joyful Limited Edition
  • Target ASTRO BOT Joyful Limited Edition

Update 9/12: Pre-orders for the new Astro Bot Joyful edition DualSense will go live this morning at 7 a.m. PT/10 a.m. PT directly from Sony, and we are expecting to see “participating” retailers with units as well. You’ll want to be ready ahead of the official start time if you’re going with direct.playstation.com – the virtual queue tends to open ahead of time.

Back in June Sony officially revealed a new edition of its beloved and equally as adorable Astro Bot DualSense controller. We got our first look at the new controller a few months back, but Sony has announced when you’ll actually be able to get your hands on one.
